creditline: Bequest from the Norman and Brenda Canedy Collection
description: monochromatic image of a standing female figure "Rome" wearing a feathered helm and holding with a papal tiara looking down at the Genius of Art, who appears as a seated winged man, with the symbols of the three visual arts, a palette, a carved relief and a compass and column base
object_name: One of a pair of oil sketches
title: "Artes Resurgent" Sacred Rome Preparing to Elevate the Genius of the Fine Arts
